data.text: Khawasuo Jisu'n Synagogue-ah aleikirnook, khawakhan akut kathi miring inkhat aleiom.
Jisu diang noonnasik ithosial ombe tia athang suonasik kamanuom mi lekkhat khawakhan in-enna inleiom; khawa jarra inmani'n Sernikhuo khan ama'n miring pakha amindambe tia katha-ah inlei-ensui.
Jisu'n kanapa diang aleiti, “Matianghin hongkalro.”
Halli Ama'n inmani diang aleirakel, “Sernikhuo khan eini Sinadan in ang thocha atime? sansik emakli minmang sikbe? Tu ka-ang khat ringkhuo sansik emakli minmangsik hibe?”

Jisu'n amit kalek-ah inmani diang alei-enna aleiraang, inmani malung kangar khat-um inthamak jarra aleipoongpui. Khawasuoli ama'n mipa diangkhan aleiti, “Nakut keisuoro.” Ama'n akut aheikeisuo, halli akutkha aleidam.
Khawasuo Pharisee ngai'n Synagogue inmathaanna inleisi; halli Herod mi ngaile innot-ah in-inmuwa, inmani'n Jisu thatnasik chuon inleiminsuuk.
Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaile Galilee tuidiiltiang inleisi, Galileeya inphut mipui katamtak in anuk inleijui,
Judea ramma, Jerusalemma, Idumea ramma, Jordan raaltiangnga kaom ram, khat-um Tyre le Sidon rampumpuiya mi katamtak in Jisu itho ngaikha injet-ah amadiang inheiwa.
Mipui intamhei jarra ama in-uum maknasik Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang rakuong inkhat amasik minteiru aleitipi. Jisu sik asiamruoi ngai'n rakuong inleimintei.
Ama'n mi katamtak aleimindam, khat-um akana rakip in ama katooknasik ama omnatiang inlei-inneng.
Ratha kathamak kanei mirakip in ama inmu phakhan, inmani'n amaikuungnga inleipur khat-um inringnga inleikheek, “Nangchu Pathian Sapa kha na-eii!”
Jisu'n ratha kathamak ipuutpi inmani ngaidiang ama tutakme tihi tu inkhatdiang tipimaru tia chong kanatak aleipeii.
Jisu'n ching inkhat akalla halli ama'n imanuom mi ngaikha aleikoi. Inmani'n amadiang inheiwa,
han ama'n soomleini ngaikha amale inruoisik khat-um chongkaril sik-ah aleikadangnga “Tirton tia aleikoi,
khat-um raikhuo ngai puutsuok nasik ranak aleipeii.”
Hiwa senghi ikadang soomleini ngaikha in-eii: Simon (Peter tia Jisu'n araming aphuo);
James li anai John, Zebedee sangai (Jisu'n Boanerges tia araming aleiphuo, hiwa tinachu “Ruokinri sapa ngai” tina eii);
Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Matthew, Thomas, Alphaeus sapa James, Thaddaeus, Simon Patriot,
Halli Judas Iscariot, Jisu kajuorpa, hiwa ngaihi in-eii.
Khawa suoli Jisu'n inntiang aleikir. Woikhat-um khawa ka-ang akatam mipui inchun nook-ah Jisu khat-um asiamruoi ngaikha bubaknasik pha leimumu.
Ama insuung mi ngai'n hiwachong injetpha, inmani'n amakha ruoinasik inleitho, ajarchu inmani'n inleiti, “Amahi inweetjei!”
Jerusalem tiangnga kahong Dan Karu lekkhat ngai'n, “Ama suungnga Beelzebul om! raikhuo ngai lamkakeipa khan amadiang ranak apeya halli inmani iminpuutsuok eii,” inleiti. Matt 9:34; 10:25
Khawa jarra Jisu'n inmani ngaikha akoolla koiya, inmani diang chongminkhi ngaikha aleirilpi: “Angtho thoa Seitan in Seitan apuutsuok sikme?
Rengram inkhat in inthenkhoiya rupni insuok inchu inkhatli inkhat insuol inta, khawa rengram kha akoisik eii.
Insuungkhur inkhat inthenkhoiya rupni insuok inchu inkhatli inkhat insuol inta, khawa insuungkhur kha akoisik eii.
Khawa jarra Seitan rengram hi rupni suok ah inthenkhoi inchu, khawa kha sootnuni, takkha alek alek-ah koita amang wiaksik eii.
Tu inkhat innum aka-ngar mipa kha akhitmasa-ah adamak inchu, a-inn luut-ah aneinaak rakip kha leimator nuni.
Inthiangnga kei'n nangni diang kitihi eii, khachu mi ngai manu rakip khat-um inrilse angjet leiom innum angaidam pisik eii.3:28. inrilse angjet leiom; emakli Pathian chungnga karilse ngaikha.
Takkha tu e-innum Ratha Inthiang chungnga karilse ngaikha angtikniteii ngaidam pinuni, ajarchu ama'n hektik kaboi manu kha athojei.” Luk 12:10
“Ama suungnga ratha kathamak kha aom” mi lekkhat in inti jarra, Jisu'n hiwahi aleiti.
Khawa suoli Jisu anu le anai ngai inhongtung jei. Inmani'n inntuolla inngirra amadiang chong inminsiya ama inleikoi.
Jisu koolla mipui katamtak inlei in-ong, halli inmani'n ama diang inleiti, “Enro, nanu le na-u nanai, nasar ngai'n tuolla nang inna inmupuizoot-ah inom.”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Tume kei kanu? Tume kei ka-u kanai ngai?”
Ama koolla in-ong mipui ngaikha ahei-enna aleiti, “Enru! Hinna kaom ngaihi kei kanu khat-um kei ka-u kanai ngaikha in eii!
Tu e-innum Pathian lungdou katho ngaikha ka-u kanai, kanu khat-um kasar ngaikha in eii.”
